name: Music it
description: WebApp where students can find a teacher around them, book lessons and keep track of the lessons. Built using a RESTful Web API using Ruby on Rails and React.js + Material UI for the front-end.

name: Tasky
description: Online Task Management system where users can delegate tasks and monitor progress. Built using a RESTful Web Api using Ruby on Rails and React.js + Semantic UI for the front-end

name: FX Trading Game
description: Trading game consisting in buying and selling currencies.Written in JavaScript, using Ruby on Rails for the back-end API. External API gathered real-time FX prices then we store the data in the Database (API usage limits).

name: Rent Trader
description: Online house swapping app built with the purpose of helping people to exchange homes. Developed a Rails API backend. Implemented user interface employing HTML and CSS for styling.
